00174    /*
00175    * Serialize a ParamComponent as a string.
00176    */
00177    template <class Archive>
00178    void ParamComponent::serialize(Archive& ar, const unsigned int version)
00179    {
00180       std::string str;
00181       if (Archive::is_saving()) {
00182          std::ostringstream buffer;
00183          writeParam(buffer);
00184          str = buffer.str();
00185          // std::cout << "Saving archive" << std::endl;
00186          // std::cout << str << std::endl;
00187       } 
00188       ar & str;
00189       if (Archive::is_loading()) {
00190          // std::cout << "Loading archive" << std::endl;
00191          // std::cout << str << std::endl;
00192          std::istringstream buffer(str);
00193          readParam(buffer);
00194       } 
00195    }
00196 
00197 } 
00198 #endif
